snippet: The world rally driving champion Sebastien Loeb will compete in only 4 of the 13 events on the calendar next season.
abstract: World rally driving champion Sebastien Loeb will compete in only 4 of 13 events next season.
lead_paragraph: The world rally driving champion Sebastien Loeb will compete in only 4 of the 13 events on the calendar next season.

headline.main: Loeb to Enter Four Rallies Next Year
